name: Bad End Makers: Chapter 1 Rise of Red King
name_original: Bad End Makers: Chapter 1 Rise of Red King
description: In the war between good and evil good always wins, but, do you ever wondered, what if evil would prevail? In this game you will learn the answer, help to the Red King aka FACE from Yume Nikki take over the dream world of one certain window girl, with help of mysterious incarnation of evil, Face got a new "vessel" to make his dream come true, but with the new body there is a new challenge waiting for him and new enemies, help to prove that even Evil can win at once in this different from Happy End Project story.
